title: 4K - City of Shadows (1987) Crime Thriller | He's a Good Cop...Caught in a Twisted Game.

sources.title: 4K - City of Shadows (1987) Crime Thriller | He's a Good Cop...Caught in a Twisted Game.
sources.description:
He's a Good Cop..Living in a Bad Dream.
Renegade cop Paul (Paul Coufos) faces off against his estranged brother Garrett (Damian Lee), a dangerous figure tied to a string of disturbing crimes, in a gritty battle where family ties and justice collide. As Paul navigates a fog-drenched urban nightmare, he must confront his own demons while trying to stop Garrett’s chaotic reign—before it’s too late

Original title: City of Shadows (1987) Also known as: Nightmare City

Director : David Mitchell
Writers: Damian Lee, Peter Jobin
Cast : Paul Coufos, Damian Lee, Marsha Levine

Genres: Action, Crime, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Release date: December 11, 1987 
Filming location: Toronto, Canada


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
